p: Hierarchical clustering (HCA) and correlation analysis were carried out using IBM SPSS Statistics software, version 19.0 (IBM Corp., Armonk, New York, NY, USA). Cluster analysis was run using the complete linkage method. Correlation analysis between was performed via Pearsonâ€™s correlation. Principal component analysis (PCA) was carried out using Unscrambler software, version 9.7 (CAMO Software AS, Oslo, Norway).
